title: Pre-Service Teacher Competency Enhancement Program for Inquiry-Based Science Learning Curriculum Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and general educational theory comprehension
context.additional_context: In a blended environment of pre-service and in-service teachers, the program focuses on designing and implementing inquiry-based science instruction, with an emphasis on building personalized learning environments using digital tools.

learning_goals: Learners can understand and apply the core elements of inquiry-based science instruction (question design, experimental planning, data analysis, conclusion drawing).
Learners can design educational scenarios that promote students’ scientific thinking skills using simulation/VR tools.
Learners can analyze the educative features of the curriculum and modify them to meet the needs of students and teachers.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
